abstract: The airline has been forced to cancel about 450 domestic and international flights, affecting almost 60,000 customers.
snippet: The airline has been forced to cancel about 450 domestic and international flights, affecting almost 60,000 customers.
lead_paragraph: TOKYO — All Nippon Airways, an enthusiastic Boeing customer now reeling from battery problems on its Dreamliner jets, said on Thursday that the grounding of its 787 fleet hurt sales by about $15.4 million in January, casting a shadow on the airline’s future earnings.

headline.main: All Nippon Says Grounding of 787s Has Cost $15 Million
headline.print_headline: All Nippon Says Grounding Of 787s Has Cost $15 Million
